pages.text:
&n&6&lDimension:&r&r    &n&lOverworld&r
&n&6&lArea Level:&r&r    &n1 - 15 &r&r
&n&6&lEnraged Area Level:&r &n50 - 70&r
&n&6&lExceptions:&r  &nIce Maze lvl 35+&r
&n&6&lQuests covered:&r  &nPrologue; Act I; part of Act III
&n&6&lDimension gateways:&r  &nAct I Gateway; Gateway of the Deep Sea&r
&n&6&lDimension Bosses:&r   &nHermit Abysswalker; Invoker; Frostmaw; Grim Reaper; Eel; Mother of the Maze; Ghost of Captain Cornelia&r

The start of your legendary adventure!$(br) &l&nThe Overworld&r is ripe with structures and loot to be found. Caps at level 15 with some higher level exceptions such as the Ice Maze (lvl 35 minimum).$(br) &l&nThe Overworld&r &nis intended to be your home dimension&r and is the only one you can claim in with Flan. A relatively safe dimension allowing you to set up your home base.
